sys_update_set.description:
This Update Set includes configuration changes made to optimize user, group, and role management in the ServiceNow platform. It features:
Custom user roles and group-role mappings
Automated onboarding and offboarding workflows using Flow Designer
Access Control Rules (ACLs) for secure table-level and record-level access
A Service Catalog item for requesting new user access with approvals
Notifications and approval logic tied to user provisioning flows
This setup streamlines administrative tasks, enforces role-based access, and enhances the overall efficiency of user lifecycle management within the platform.
sys_update_set.name: UserAccessOptimization
